definitions.definition: the production of books, newspapers, or other printed material.
a single impression of a book.
handwriting in which the letters are written separately rather than being joined together.
produce (books, newspapers, magazines, etc.), especially in large quantities, by a mechanical process involving the transfer of text, images, or designs to paper.
examples: a thousand copies of the book were printed
synonyms: reprint "the newspaper is printed just after midnight"

definitions.definition: produce (text or a picture) by printing.
examples: the words had been printed in blue type
synonyms: reprint "the newspaper is printed just after midnight"

definitions.definition: (of a newspaper or magazine) publish (a piece of writing) within its pages.
examples: the article was printed in the first edition

definitions.definition: (of a publisher or printer) arrange for (a book, manuscript, etc.) to be reproduced in large quantities.
produce a paper copy of (information stored on a computer).
examples: the results of a search can be printed out

definitions.definition: send (a computer file) to a printer or to another, temporary file.
produce (a photographic print) from a negative.
examples: any make of film can be developed and printed

definitions.definition: write (text) clearly without joining the letters.
examples: print your name and address on the back of the check

definitions.definition: mark (a surface, typically a textile or a garment) with a colored design or pattern.
examples: a delicate fabric printed with roses
synonyms: mark "patterns were printed on the cloth"

definitions.definition: transfer (a colored design or pattern) to a surface.
examples: patterns of birds, flowers, and trees were printed on the cotton

definitions.definition: make (a mark or indentation) on a surface or in a soft substance by pressing something onto it.
examples: he printed a mark on her soft skin

definitions.definition: mark or indent (the surface of a soft substance).
examples: we printed the butter with carved wooden butter molds

definitions.definition: fix (something) firmly or indelibly in someone's mind.
examples: his face, with its clearly drawn features, was printed on her memory
synonyms: mark "the incident is printed on her memory"
